remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，使用此方法从属性中删除时钟不会停止这些时钟。Note that using this method to remove clocks from a property does not stop those clocks. ## 使用撰写 HandoffBehaviorUsing the Compose HandoffBehavior 使用将、或应用 到属性时 ， 以前与该属性关联的任何对象将继续使用系统资源; 计时系统不会自动删除这些时钟。When you apply a , , or to a property using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system will not remove these clocks automatically. 若要避免在使用应用大量时钟时出现性能问题 ，应在完成后从动画属性中删除组合时钟。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 删除时钟有多种方法。There are several ways to remove a clock. - 若要从属性中删除所有时钟，请 使用 动画对象的或方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 将要进行动画处理的属性指定为第一个参数，并将指定 `null` 为第二个参数。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 这将从该属性中删除所有动画时钟。This will remove all animation clocks from the property. - 若要从时钟列表中删除特定的 ，请使用 的属性 来检索 ，然后调用的 方法 。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 通常在 时钟的事件处理程序中完成此操作。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 请注意，只能通过控制根时钟， 子时钟的属性将返回 `null` 。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock will return `null`. 另请注意， 如果时钟的有效持续时间是永久性的，则不会调用事件。Note also that the event will not be called if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在这种情况下，用户将需要确定何时调用 。In that case, the user will need to determine when to call . 此动画问题主要出现在生存期较长的对象上。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 当对某个对象进行垃圾回收时，它的时钟也会断开连接并进行垃圾回收。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks will also be disconnected and garbage collected. 有关时钟对象的详细信息，请参阅 [动画和计时系统概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview)。For more information about clock objects, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用不同的设置应用动画时钟 。The following example shows how to apply animation clocks using different settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果动画的 大于零，动画将从呈现下一个帧之后经过的时间开始算起。If the animation has a that is greater than zero, the animation begins after that amount of time has elapsed from the time the next frame is rendered.

计时系统不会自动删除这些时钟。When you apply a , , or to a property using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system will not remove these clocks automatically. 若要避免在使用应用大量时钟时出现性能问题 ，应在完成后从动画属性中删除组合时钟。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 删除时钟有多种方法。There are several ways to remove a clock. - 若要从属性中删除所有时钟，请 使用 动画对象的或方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 将要进行动画处理的属性指定为第一个参数，并将指定 `null` 为第二个参数。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 这将从该属性中删除所有动画时钟。This will remove all animation clocks from the property. - 若要从时钟列表中删除特定的 ，请使用 的属性 来检索 ，然后调用的 方法 。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 通常在 时钟的事件处理程序中完成此操作。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 请注意，只能通过控制根时钟， 子时钟的属性将返回 `null` 。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock will return `null`. 另请注意， 如果时钟的有效持续时间是永久性的，则不会调用事件。Note also that the event will not be called if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在这种情况下，用户将需要确定何时调用 。In that case, the user will need to determine when to call . 此动画问题主要出现在生存期较长的对象上。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 当对某个对象进行垃圾回收时，它的时钟也会断开连接并进行垃圾回收。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks will also be disconnected and garbage collected. 有关时钟对象的详细信息，请参阅 [动画和计时系统概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview)。For more information about clock objects, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用不同的设置来应用动画 。The following example shows how to apply animations using different settings. summary.span: 创建此 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 在复制此对象的依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但它们可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of this instance.

returns.span: 返回的复本实际上是当前对象的深层副本。

span.span: The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object.
The clone's property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用于生成冻结对象的可修改副本 。The method can be used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects. 为方便起见，此方法隐藏了继承 方法以提供强类型实现。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited method to provide a strongly typed implementation.

param.name: isChecking
param.span: 如果此方法只能确定此实例是否可以冻结，则为 。

span.span: if this method should simply determine whether this instance can be frozen.

param.span: 如果此实例在此方法被调用时实际上会冻结自身，则为 。

span.span: if this instance should actually freeze itself when this method is called.

summary.span: 使此 对象成为不可修改的对象，或确定是否可使其成为不可修改的对象。

span.span: Makes this object unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable.

returns.span: 当 为 时，如果可以使此 成为不可修改的，则此方法返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if this can be made unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.

returns.span: 当 为 时，如果此 当前不可修改，则此方法返回 ；或者，如果无法使其成为不可修改的，并且副作用是已开始更改此对象的冻结状态，则返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the if this is now unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `false`当为时，此方法将返回 `true` 。This method will return `false` when is `true`. 请勿直接调用此方法， (在实现) 中调用基时除外。Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation). 此方法由 与等于) 的 (在内部调用 `isChecking` `true` ， (`isChecking` 等于 `false`) 。This method is called internally by (with `isChecking` equal to `true`) and (with `isChecking` equal to `false`).

para.span: 如果类包含未使用依赖项属性存储的数据，则从派生的类必须重写此方法。

span.span: Classes that derive from must override this method when the class contains data that is not stored using dependency properties.

para.span: 典型的实现将调用基实现，然后 对 类所包含的所有类型属性调用静态方法， 仅当所有属性都已冻结时才返回 (或在通过) 的值进行传递时返回 。

span.span: A typical implementation would call the base implementation, then call the static method on all typed properties that the class contains, returning only if all properties were frozen (or could have been frozen, in the case of passing through a value for ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用 方法来确定是否应序列化属性。The class uses the method to determine if a property should be serialized.
